Class StoreDataHandler

java.lang.Object
util.StoreDataHandler
public class StoreDataHandler extends Object
Handles all file I/O for saving and loading data. includes activity date tracking for inactivity detection.

  • Constructor Details

    • StoreDataHandler

      public StoreDataHandler()
      Constructs a StoreDataHandler.

  • Method Details

    • saveInventory

      public void saveInventory(Inventory inventory)
      Saves the current inventory to INVENTORY_FILE.
      Parameters:
      inventory - (Inventory) The inventory object to save.

    • loadInventory

      public Inventory loadInventory()
      Loads the inventory from INVENTORY_FILE. If the file is empty, it creates a default inventory.
      Returns:
      (Inventory) The loaded inventory.

    • saveCustomers

      public void saveCustomers(List<Customer> customerList)
      Saves the customer list to CUSTOMERS_FILE with activity date tracking. Format: UserID,LastName,FirstName,MiddleName,Password,MembershipCardID,CardExpiry,Points,LastActivityDate
      Parameters:
      customerList - (List) The list of customers.

    • loadCustomers

      public List<Customer> loadCustomers()
      Loads the customer list from CUSTOMERS_FILE with activity date support. Format: UserID,LastName,FirstName,MiddleName,Password,MembershipCardID,CardExpiry,Points,LastActivityDate Handles both old format (without activity date) and new format (with activity date).
      Returns:
      (List) The loaded customer list.

    • generateUserID

      public String generateUserID(List<Customer> existingCustomers)
      Generates a new User ID in format DLSUser-XXX.
      Parameters:
      existingCustomers - List of existing customers to check for ID conflicts.
      Returns:
      A unique User ID.

    • generateMembershipCardID

      public String generateMembershipCardID(List<Customer> existingCustomers)
      Generates a new Membership Card ID in format DLSUCS-XXXXXXXX.
      Parameters:
      existingCustomers - List of existing customers to check for ID conflicts.
      Returns:
      A unique Membership Card ID.

    • saveReceipt

      public void saveReceipt(String receipt)
      Saves a receipt string to RECEIPT_LOG_FILE.
      Parameters:
      receipt - (String) The receipt text.

    • saveSalesLog

      public void saveSalesLog(String summary)
      Saves a transaction summary to SALES_LOG_FILE.
      Parameters:
      summary - (String) The CSV summary line.

    • displaySalesLog

      public void displaySalesLog()
      Displays the sales log to the console.

    • saveSales

      public void saveSales(SaleManager saleManager)
      Saves product sales to file. Format: saleID,targetID,discountType,discountValue,startDate,endDate,isActive

    • loadSales

      public void loadSales(SaleManager saleManager)
      Loads product sales from file.
